text: TWO-PHASE COMMIT Each node records the outcome of each phase in a non-volatile storage log. What happens if coordinator crashes? — Participants must decide what to do. What happens if participant crashes? — Coordinator assumes that it responded with an abort if it hasn't sent an acknowledgement yet. - £2CMUDB M » PI M 31512223 @ #c 23 - Distributed OLTP Databases (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
